entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Small Regions 2001. The situation of the disadvantaged Hungarian schools in the area of public education. Maintainer sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E75f: TÁRKI Small Regions 2001. The situation of the disadvantaged Hungarian schools in the area of public education. Maintainer sample.. data sheet. Version: 2007-02-12
entry.dcterms:creator: Imre, Anna
entry.dcterms:description: relationshop between the local self-government and the school, performing public education tasks, financing of schools
entry.dcterms:subject: education, school
business/industrial management and organisation
income, property and savings
public services
survey data
cross-section

As a starting point of the research, 6 underprivileged regions were selected, and all schools within this area was included in the sample. The maintainer questionnaire was completed by the local self-government administrator responsible for the maitenance of the school in question.
face-to-face interview
A
